reviewText: Very focus on the U.S. reality. Could be much better if would bring the different approaches of the major players on sustainability worldwide, specially comparing more with the regulations at the EU as a leading player on environmental law and performance.
A great introduction to the legal and regulatory angle of ESG, including private sector initiatives, product stewardship, and greenwashing.

Good overview of this field for beginners.   Gives background on environmental issues impacting businesses and the world.  Well organized, good clear presentation.   I must note that I was hoping for more "actionable" thoughts for businesses;    aside from a few very broad strokes these weren't a major part of the course.

Extremely helpful and eye opener on the effect of climate change on our world and the contribution/actions we can take to resolve such issues. It provided a better understanding of ESG and Climate Change. Thank you for organizing this discussion.
Great course which gave me a brief introduction to the concept of ESG! Thanks Sarah!

This is a good course which gave better understanding and structured my knowledge of connection of the ESG rhetoric in business and media and the climate change issues.Obviously, it is USA focused but provides a decent overview of other countries' issues and practices.
Very interesting. General information on ESG concepts.
excellent!!!
Really enjoyed this course & learning about the fundamental of EGS around the world.  It is an important topic & I look forward to learning more.
Very useful course on ESG and climate change and an excellent presentation by Pr. Light.
The content of the course was appropriate and made sense. In addition, kudos to the instructor for making it engaging and meaningful.
Thank you a lot  for understanding and allowing me to participate in the courseExcellent course!Best regards,Tihomir Vulic
I enjoyed Sarah's way of teaching was very useful and inspiring for me to pursue a career in sustainability.
Excellent content. Informative. Useful statistics. Well explained. Re-usable slides.
Excellent course to introduce a person to understand the problem in detail but in simple words.
Excelente curso. Muy bien explicado.
C​ontent well mixed with case studies and practical scenarios help understand the topic.
A​n extraordinary instructor and very comprehensive materials.
e​asy to understand
V​ery well designed course and the teacher presented it in wonderful way.
A​ course worth investing time and energy.
G​reat course! The information was well delivered and easy to understand. I did it in a day and was able to finish it in about 5 hours.
v​ery useful
The course is very well designed for professionals engaging with ESG and Climate change
Very useful foundation course on climate change and what's going on around the globe!!  :)
Well-researched and useful information, very practical with real and true case studies. The sincerity and competence of  Sarah Light in the presentations is very moving indeed.
Very insightful and well instructed.
Great Content. Everything there's to know about Climate Change, Sustainability, Green Legal Governance and Circular Economy. Expert Lecturer.
Good overview of concepts related to ESG. Provides numerous case studies from businesses, governements and other actors in the space. Coherent presentation and progression of the course.
V​ery good!
A​ great course on ESG & climate change!
A​ course for everybody
Very well defined course.
Muito rico em conteúdo, com informações relevantes e atuais.
Very insightful, helpful to undertand the idea and concept of ESG. Thank you!
Thank you
The teacher was inspiring and the slides were nice and informative and supported the learning. The subject was dealt with in a comprehensive but easy-to-follow manner
I learn a lot from this course. It's an eye-opening knowlegde! Thank you
